title: How Mara Roszak Went From Doing Her Friends' Bat Mitzvah Hair to Styling Emma Stone and Zoe Salda√±a for the Oscars
description: In our long-running series, "How I'm Making It," we talk to people making a living in the fashion and beauty industries about how they broke in and found success. Mara Roszak's entry into hairstyling is a relatable one, especially for those of us who experienced adolescence in the '90s and early ...Continue reading
author: Steph Saltzman
